title: [Bug] Overly broad exception catching masks unexpected errors

changes_summary.description: Fixed overly broad exception catching in run_command() by replacing 'except Exception' with specific exception types (ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError). This allows KeyboardInterrupt and SystemExit to propagate properly.

files_changed.src/flywheel/cli.py: Added 'import json' and changed 'except Exception as exc:' to 'except (ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError) as exc:' on line 125

risks: None identified - the change is minimal and well-tested
limitations: None identified - the fix addresses the issue completely

acceptance_criteria_met: Only catch expected exception types: ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError
KeyboardInterrupt is allowed to propagate (user can Ctrl+C)
